first-project-description: Our microservices architecture delivers comprehensive e-commerce functionality, including Catalog, Basket, Discount, and Ordering modules. We employ both NoSQL and Relational databases and utilize RabbitMQ for event-driven communication. The Ocelot API Gateway manages communication between the microservices, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance.
second-project-description: Our RESTful API, powered by ASP.NET Core, features advanced filtering, robust data modeling, and HATEOAS support. Implemented using clean architecture principles, it integrates seamlessly with Entity Framework Core. The frontend is built with the Angular framework for a seamless user experience.
third-project-description: This project features minimalistic templates, designed to help you quickly implement clean architecture concepts and make progress on your project with ease.
fourth-project-description: Linky is a sleek URL shortening solution, crafted with simplicity in mind, utilizing the power of the Minimal API.
third-cert: Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals.
description-first-cert: Earners of the Azure Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
description-second-cert: Earners of the Azure Data Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational knowledge of core data concepts and how they are implemented using Microsoft Azure data services.
description-third-cert: Earners of the Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals demonstrate a functional understanding of security, compliance, and identity (SCI) across cloud-based and related Microsoft services.
